name: Windy Ducky
description:
Windy ducky for the rain game jam

Didn't have time to test it, sorry if there are glitches

This is a demo tell me what you think

Hold left mouse button to collect rain

When you have enough rain and there's no rain block on the screen right click to create one

Left shift to destroy said block

And move with arrow keys and wasd and jump from up arrow key and W

Your goal is to get your lost rubber ducky
